verses.name: Psalms 78:1
verses.text: Give ear, O my people, to my law: incline your ears to the words of my mouth.

verses.name: Psalms 78:2
verses.text: I will open my mouth in a parable: I will utter dark sayings of old:

verses.name: Psalms 78:3
verses.text: Which we have heard and known, and our fathers have told us.

verses.name: Psalms 78:4
verses.text: We will not hide them from their children, shewing to the generation to come the praises of the Lord, and his strength, and his wonderful works that he hath done.
